history.narrative: Law 5-85 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 5-357, which was referred to the Committee on Public Services and Cable Television. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on March 13, 1984, and March 27, 1984, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on April 5, 1984, it was assigned Act No. 5-123 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
